name: CYBERCHASE (HadiaShahid)
description:
CYBERCHASE is an action-packed tabletop RPG based on the Lumen System by Gila RPGs. Set in a dystopian cyberpunk city known as Ring City in 2085, there isn't a single person who hasn’t had cybernetic technology implanted in them. It’s since become a matter of lifestyle choice, becoming as common as tattoos and other accessories. As a result, strolling through the city will land your eyes on various and unique individuals, such as yourself.

You and your team are anonymously contacted by a corporate agent, known as Vee, to help deliver various valuable and stolen nanotech back to teraCom Cybernetics. You’ll first have to retrieve it though. However, several shady people and members from the well-known Skinhead gang are expected to try to steal it to use it as a cyberware implant on themselves in order to become more powerful. 

With 3 powerful classes, cunning enemies, and a multitude of weapons to choose from, the possibilities are endless in Ring City.
